Package edu.cofc.grader

Class IO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cofc.grader.IO

  • public class IO
extends java.lang.Object
    IO is a class that contains static utility methods used to capture student output and set input to test Scanners and various input streams.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void clearOutput​()
      Resets any output stored in the output stream
      static java.lang.String getOutput​()
      Gets the output from the outputstream then resets the outputstream Must start capturing output before use - see startOutputCapture()
      static void resetOutputStream​()  
      static void restoreInput​()
      Restores System.in to its original inputstream
      static void restoreOutput​()
      Restores System.out to its original printstream
      static void setInput​(java.lang.String in)
      Sets the input System.in
      static void startOutputCapture​()
      Starts capturing output from System.out Use getOutput() to retrieve output
      static void stealOutput​()
      Disables output from System.out.
